sn35.74:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.74:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.74:4.4: “amukasmiṃ, bhante, vihāre aññataro bhikkhu navo appaññāto ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35.74:4.5: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn35.74:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā navavādañca sutvā gilānavādañca, “appaññāto bhikkhū”ti iti viditvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami.
sn35.74:5.2: Addasā kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn35.74:5.3: Disvāna mañcake samadhosi.
sn35.74:5.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35.74:5.8: Nisajja kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35.74:5.9: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.74:6.1: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn35.74:7.1: “Kacci te, bhikkhu, na kiñci kukkuccaṃ, na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35.74:8.1: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṃ kukkuccaṃ, anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn35.74:9.1: “Kacci pana taṃ, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti?
sn35.74:10.1: “Na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn35.74:11.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35.74:12.1: “Na khvāhaṃ, bhante, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35.74:13.1: “No ce kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi, atha kimatthaṃ carahi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn35.74:14.1: “Rāgavirāgatthaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35.74:15.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, rāgavirāgatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
sn35.74:15.3: Rāgavirāgattho hi, bhikkhu, mayā dhammo desito.
sn35.74:15.4: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, bhikkhu, cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.74:19.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.74:21.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35.74:23.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati … pe …
sn35.74:24.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn35.74:24.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhuno virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
